data.name: Sleeping Dogs: The High Roller Pack
data.detailed_description: Want that fast track to the in-crowd? Look like the real deal with the super fast, luxury Tuono vehicle and High Roller outfit. Plus, with an extra $200k to burn you can be sure to get ahead and get noticed. Please note this pack gives you early access to the Tuono vehicle and the High Roller outfit, these items can also be earned through  the normal game progression.
data.about_the_game: Want that fast track to the in-crowd? Look like the real deal with the super fast, luxury Tuono vehicle and High Roller outfit. Plus, with an extra $200k to burn you can be sure to get ahead and get noticed. Please note this pack gives you early access to the Tuono vehicle and the High Roller outfit, these items can also be earned through  the normal game progression.
data.short_description: Want that fast track to the in-crowd? Look like the real deal with the super fast, luxury Tuono vehicle and High Roller outfit. Plus, with an extra $200k to burn you can be sure to get ahead and get noticed.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows Vista or Windows 7
  • Processor:Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 10 or 11 compatible Nvidia or AMD ATI card, ATI Radeon 3870 or higher, Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT or higher
  • DirectX®:10
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor:Quad-core Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 11 Nvidia or AMD ATI card, Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 or ATI Radeon 6950
  • DirectX®:11
  • Hard Drive:15 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
